text: Ihor Stolovytskyi (; born 29 August 1969) is a former Soviet and Ukrainian footballer and Ukrainian football coach. ==Career== He worked as a manager of FC Cherkaskyi Dnipro and previously played for FC Dnipro Cherkasy. == References == ==External links== * * Stolovytskyi profile at FC Cherkaskyi Dnipro Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cherkasy Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Russia Category:FC Shakhtar Donetsk players Category:FC Torpedo Zaporizhia players Category:FC Dnipro Cherkasy players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Cherkashchyna managers Category:FC Kremin Kremenchuk managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Ihor Stolovytskyi
